Package us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

Interface Pose2DReadOnly

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FixedFramePose2DBasics, FramePose2DBasics, FramePose2DReadOnly, Pose2DBasics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FramePose2D, Pose2D
    public interface Pose2DReadOnly
    Read-only interface for a pose 2D.

    A pose 2D represents a position and orientation in the XY-plane.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default boolean containsNaN()
      Tests if this pose 2D contains a Double.NaN.
      default boolean epsilonEquals​(Pose2DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Tests on a per-component basis if this pose is equal to other with separate tolerances for the position positionEpsilon and the orientation orientationEpsilon.
      default boolean equals​(Pose2DReadOnly other)
      Tests on a per component basis, if this pose 2D is exactly equal to other.
      default boolean geometricallyEquals​(Pose2DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Compares this to other to determine if the two poses are geometrically similar.
      default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.RigidBodyTransform transformToPack)
      Packs this pose 2D into the given transformToPack.
      Orientation2DReadOnly getOrientation()
      Gets the read-only reference of the orientation part of this pose 2D.
      default double getOrientationDistance​(Orientation2DReadOnly other)
      Computes the absolute angle difference between the orientation part of this pose 2D and the give orientation.
      default double getOrientationDistance​(Pose2DReadOnly other)
      Computes the absolute angle difference between this pose 2D and other.
      us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly getPosition()
      Gets the read-only reference of the position part of this pose 2D.
      default double getPositionDistance​(Pose2DReadOnly other)
      Computes the distances between the position part of the two poses.
      default double getPositionDistance​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly point)
      Computes the distance between the position of this pose 2D and the given point.
      default double getX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the position part of this pose 2D.
      default double getY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the position part of this pose 2D.
      default double getYaw()
      Gets the yaw angle of the orientation part of this pose 2D.

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        default double getX()
        Gets the x-coordinate of the position part of this pose 2D.
        Returns:
        the x-coordinate of this pose 2D.

      • getY

        default double getY()
        Gets the y-coordinate of the position part of this pose 2D.
        Returns:
        the y-coordinate of this pose 2D.

      • getYaw

        default double getYaw()
        Gets the yaw angle of the orientation part of this pose 2D.
        Returns:
        the yaw angle of this pose 2D.

      • containsNaN

        default boolean containsNaN()
        Tests if this pose 2D contains a Double.NaN.
        Returns:
        true if either the position or orientation part of this pose 2D contains Double.NaN, false otherwise.

      • getPosition

        us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly getPosition()
        Gets the read-only reference of the position part of this pose 2D.
        Returns:
        the position part of this pose 2D.

      • getOrientation

        Orientation2DReadOnly getOrientation()
        Gets the read-only reference of the orientation part of this pose 2D.
        Returns:
        the orientation part of this pose 2D.

      • get

        default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.RigidBodyTransform transformToPack)
        Packs this pose 2D into the given transformToPack.
        Parameters:
        transformToPack - the rigid-body transform that is set to represent this pose 2D. Modified.

      • getPositionDistance

        default double getPositionDistance​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple2D.interfaces.Point2DReadOnly point)
        Computes the distance between the position of this pose 2D and the given point.
        Parameters:
        point - the other point used to measure the distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the distance between this pose and the given point.

      • getPositionDistance

        default double getPositionDistance​(Pose2DReadOnly other)
        Computes the distances between the position part of the two poses.
        Parameters:
        other - the other pose used to measure the distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the distance between the position part of the two poses.

      • getOrientationDistance

        default double getOrientationDistance​(Orientation2DReadOnly other)
        Computes the absolute angle difference between the orientation part of this pose 2D and the give orientation.
        Parameters:
        other - the orientation used to compute the orientation distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the absolute angle difference between this and orientation.

      • getOrientationDistance

        default double getOrientationDistance​(Pose2DReadOnly other)
        Computes the absolute angle difference between this pose 2D and other.
        Parameters:
        other - the other pose 2D used to compute the orientation distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the absolute angle difference between this.orientation and other.orientation.

      • equals

        default boolean equals​(Pose2DReadOnly other)
        Tests on a per component basis, if this pose 2D is exactly equal to other.
        Parameters:
        other - the other pose 2D to compare against this. Not modified.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses are exactly equal component-wise, false otherwise.

      • epsilonEquals

        default boolean epsilonEquals​(Pose2DReadOnly other,
                              double epsilon)
        Tests on a per-component basis if this pose is equal to other with separate tolerances for the position positionEpsilon and the orientation orientationEpsilon.
        Parameters:
        other - the query. Not modified.
        epsilon - the tolerance to use.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses are equal, false otherwise.

      • geometricallyEquals

        default boolean geometricallyEquals​(Pose2DReadOnly other,
                                    double epsilon)
        Compares this to other to determine if the two poses are geometrically similar.

        Two poses are geometrically equal if both their position and orientation are geometrically equal.

        Parameters:
        other - the pose to compare to. Not modified.
        epsilon - the tolerance of the comparison.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses represent the same geometry, false otherwise.
